item.title: The land that never has been yetâ€”
item.description: Langston Hughes said it better than I can, especially for this 4th of July, one where we’re reeling from the endgame of a culture war that started before I was born. Let America Be America Again Let America be America again. Let it be the dream it used to be. Let it be the pioneer on the plain Seeking a home where he himself is free. (America never was America to me.
